name: Boda - Boda madness
description: Boda-Boda Madness is a 3D side-scrolling  racing game that lets you in on what it would be like if Africa's iconic Boda-Boda riders (public service motorcycles) were extreme stunts men/women.In Boda-Boda Madness you will play as bike riders who have to transport their passengers to their destinations while collecting fuel cans and performing crazy stunts.
